docs.snippet: Small companies can strengthen security by taking relatively inexpensive and simple steps, either on their own or with the help of outside firms....
docs.lead_paragraph: Small companies can strengthen security by taking relatively inexpensive and simple steps, either on their own or with the help of outside firms.
docs.abstract: Some experts say hacking threat to small companies is increasing; toy company Rokenbok Education had its database files infected by malware and lost thousands of dollars in sales in two days; shoring up digital security can be surprisingly easy and inexpensive for small companies.

headline.main: No Business Too Small to Be Hacked
headline.print_headline: No Business Too Small to Be Hacked, but Security Need Not Be Costly

docs.snippet: Party loyalty has limits. Mr. Trump has altered the political equation because he has altered the moral equation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Party loyalty has limits. Mr. Trump has altered the political equation because he has altered the moral equation.
docs.abstract: Peter Wehner Op-Ed article declares that he will not vote for Donald Trump if he wins Republican nomination, despite having voted Republican in every presidential election since becoming eligible in 1980 and serving in three Republican administrations; suggests many other Republicans feel same way, in large part because Trump is flatly unqualified to be president.

headline.main: Why I Will Never Vote for Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Why I Will Never Vote for Trump

docs.snippet: For diplomats from countries without diplomatic relations, Secretary of State John Kerry and Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif sure are doing a lot of diplomacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: For diplomats from countries without diplomatic relations, Secretary of State John Kerry and Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif sure are doing a lot of diplomacy.

headline.main: US, Iran Forge New Relationship as Nuke Deal Advances
headline.print_headline: US, Iran Forge New Relationship as Nuke Deal Advances
